nodes.text: Omar 2 was a Deep Space Manufacturing Facility located at Omar. It was owned by Sienar Fleet Systems. It was used to produce TIE Avengers.

Omar 2 was attacked by rogue Grand Admiral Demetrius Zaarin during the First Battle of Omar. Imperial forces loyal to the Emperor managed to evacuate the facility during the attack. An additional group of survivors, who were accidentally left behind on the station, fled the scene on the transport Runner. The facility was later destroyed.
